Title: IDE Extension | 1-Click Free Deployment from VS Code & Cursor by ...
URL: https://i.youware.com/ide-extension
Text: IDE Extension | 1-Click Free Deployment from VS Code & Cursor by YouWare
# Cursor & VS Code Plugin
## Deploy Straight from Your IDE. Get a Live URL in 1 Click.
[
Get the VS Code Plugin
](https://vscode:extension/youware.youware)[
Get the Cursor Plugin
](https://cursor:extension/youware.youware)
[![Embedded YouTube video](https://img.youtube.com/vi/ja73ZeE6cvk/0.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ja73ZeE6cvk)
## From Code to Live URL in Seconds
**The YouWare IDE Extension integrates directly into your development environment. It handles the build, hosting, and deployment of your project with a single command, giving you a public URL to share anyone can view.**
> You May also like: [> Explore the YouWare MCP Marketplace
](https://i.youware.com/mcp-server)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/687479139e559930c95a2d08/68bfd4b31d63bdb4889c3e75_ide-extension-youware.png)
### Deploy your vibe-coded projects for free
#### Stop managing deployment and start shipping. Install the extension and deploy your first project in under a minute.
[
Install the Free Extension
](https://www.youware.com/plugin?utm_so
